field.name: summary
field.value: SafeAppPath creates incorrect cookie app path

field.name: description
field.value:
We're testing castle 1.1-build_728.
We've found that when application is hosted in / path (like when called from cassini) SafeAppPath returns "/" as cookie path. When hosting (at IIS) as "/path" we get "path" as cookie path, so browser (latest FF, IE7) accepts it but does not send to back in future requests. Before that revision SafeAppPath was not called when creating cookie without expiration.
The code needs to ensure there is a slash before cookie path.
